    <h2 class="f-strata-title f-uppercase" style="color: white; fill: white; text-align: center; font-size: 260%;">
     It's Sunshine Week
    </h2>
    <div class="u-mt2 u-mb2" style="text-align: left; font-size:16px;">
     <p>
      <strong>
       Too much money in politics is raised and spent in the dark.
      </strong>
     </p>
     <p>
      OpenSecrets shines a light on who is paying for inflammatory ads on the internet, and megadonors with political agendas supporting candidates in secret. We are your go to resource for weeding out corrupt behavior by elected officials.
     </p>
     <p>
      Support OpenSecret’s reporting in the public interest and transparency in money in politics.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="Button-row" style="display: flex; justify-content: center;">
     <a data-modal-toggle="scrim-ask-id-49" href="/donate?utm_campaign=donate&amp;utm_medium=SunshineWk_2021_scrim+&amp;utm_source=%2F">
      <button class="MailChimp-submit Button Button--red" style="font-size: 14px; line-height: 17px;">
       Donate Now
      </button>
     </a>
    </div>
    <div class="u-mt2 u-mb2" style="text-align: left; font-size:13px;">
     <p>
      *
      <em>
       Sunshine Week (March 14-20) is dedicated to awareness about the importance of open government and access to public information in our democracy.
      </em>
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>

           <div class="Nav-quickLinks">
            <p class="Nav-quickLinks-heading" id="quickLinks">
             Quick Links
            </p>
            <ul aria-labelledby="quickLinks" class="Nav-quickLinks-list">

       </li>
       <li class="Nav-item">

  <div aria-hidden="true" class="Header Header-sticky hide-print" id="header-sticky" role="banner">
   <div class="Header-wrap l-padding">
    <div class="Header-content l-wrap">
     <h1 class="Header-logo-sticky">
      <a class="Header-logo-link-sticky" href="/" title="OpenSecrets.org">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" height="56" preserveaspectratio="xMidYMid meet" role="img" viewbox="0 0 472 233" width="114" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <path d="M467.9 107.2c-14.6-31-65.3-72.6-148.4-94.1-129.8-33.2-299.4-4.4-318 97-3.3 17.9-.4 35-.4 35s25.5-72.2 152.1-84.6c23.7-2.6 45.9-3.3 66.7-3.3-30.6 14.9-51.8 46.7-51.8 83.1 0 51 41.6 92.6 92.6 92.6s92.6-41.6 92.6-92.6c0-30.3-14.6-57.2-37.6-74.4 78.4 14.6 121.8 43.4 132.7 51 24.8 17.5-11.3 57.2-11.3 57.2s49.1-27.9 30.8-66.9zm-137.8-9.1l-16.8 16 4 23-20.4-10.9-20.4 10.9 4-23-16.8-16 23-3.3L296.9 74l10.2 20.8 23 3.3z">

      </a>

  <div class="Main" id="main" role="main">
   <div class="Billboard l-wrap--wide">
    <picture class="Billboard-media js-background-image">
     <!--[if IE 9]><video style="display: none;"><![endif]-->
     <source media="(min-width: 1200px)" srcset="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/rails-assets/production/assets/homepage/jet-1200-4cbf262cd46dbe00eaaf0b8266b203115ef04b673970b60f161452a08187965a.jpg">
      <source media="(min-width: 800px)" srcset="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/rails-assets/production/assets/homepage/jet-800-6477bb729a1b4533975dfb25655b2d8768d8cf0d321a3eba7b7b25112ab8db41.jpg">
       <!--[if IE 9]></video><![endif]-->
       <img alt="Jet 500" src="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/rails-assets/production/assets/homepage/jet-500-789af5186e1a78c1875639f7b2591e74911df012504934fb93a135f7843dc9fe.jpg"/>
      </source>
     </source>
    </picture>
    <div class="Billboard-content bg-star-right--before bg-forest--before c-auto">
     <div class="Billboard-content-wrap l-padding">
      <h2 class="Billboard-title">
       Capitalizing on Conflict
      </h2>
      <div class="Billboard-description">
       <p class="u-mb2">
        Over the last two decades, the extensive network of lobbyists and donors tied to the defense industry directed $285 million in campaign contributions and $2.5 billion in lobbying spending as they pushed the government to approve tens of billions in arms sales.
        <span class="Billboard-content-credit">
         (Photo: FABRICE COFFRINI/AFP via Getty Images)
        </span>
       </p>
      </div>
      <a href="/news/reports/capitalizing-on-conflict">
       <div class="Billboard-cta Button Button--green">
        Read More
       </div>
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="Main-wrap l-padding u-mt4">
    <div class="l-wrap">
     <!--h2 class="f-strata-title u-mb2">OpenSecrets Blog</h2-->
     <div class="l-grid-3 u-clearfix u-mb3">
      <div class="l-col">
       <div class="Card">
        <a aria-hidden="true" class="Card-media aspect-16-9 bg-zoom" href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/2021-march-madness-kstreet-classic/" tabindex="-1">
         <img alt="March madness bracket image" class="Card-image" src="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/news/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/18125123/March-Madness-bracket-image.png"/>
        </a>
        <div class="Card-content">
         <p class="Card-label">
          <a href="/news/">
           News Post
          </a>
         </p>
         <h2 class="Card-title">
          <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/2021-march-madness-kstreet-classic/">
           March Madness 2021: These schools have the most lobbying power
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="Card-meta">
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/author/kevers/">
            By Karl Evers-Hillstrom
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           March 18, 2021
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="Card-description">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Only one college takes home the trophy in March Madness, but the entire higher education industry won big with Democrats’ stimulus package.
          </p>
         </div>
         <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/2021-march-madness-kstreet-classic/">
          <div class="Card-cta Button Button--teal">
           Read More
          </div>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="l-col">
       <div class="Card">
        <a aria-hidden="true" class="Card-media aspect-16-9 bg-zoom" href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/unions-businessgroups-battle-pro-act/" tabindex="-1">
         <img alt="Unions afl cio" class="Card-image" src="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/news/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/17135913/Unions-AFL-CIO.png"/>
        </a>
        <div class="Card-content">
         <p class="Card-label">
          <a href="/news/">
           News Post
          </a>
         </p>
         <h2 class="Card-title">
          <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/unions-businessgroups-battle-pro-act/">
           Business and labor groups battle over PRO Act
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="Card-meta">
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/author/alyce-mcfadden/">
            By Alyce McFadden
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           March 17, 2021
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="Card-description">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Business groups and unions are going head to head over the Protecting the Right to Organize Act.
          </p>
         </div>
         <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/unions-businessgroups-battle-pro-act/">
          <div class="Card-cta Button Button--teal">
           Read More
          </div>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="l-col">
       <div class="Card">
        <a aria-hidden="true" class="Card-media aspect-16-9 bg-zoom" href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/one-billion-dark-money-2020-electioncycle/" tabindex="-1">
         <img alt="Joe biden dark money" class="Card-image" src="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/news/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/17134347/Joe-Biden-Dark-Money.png"/>
        </a>
        <div class="Card-content">
         <p class="Card-label">
          <a href="/news/">
           News Post
          </a>
         </p>
         <h2 class="Card-title">
          <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/one-billion-dark-money-2020-electioncycle/">
           ‘Dark money’ topped $1 billion in 2020, largely boosting Democrats
          </a>
         </h2>
         <div class="Card-meta">
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/author/massogliaevers/">
            By Anna Massoglia and Karl Evers-Hillstrom
           </a>
          </span>
          <span class="Card-meta-item">
           March 17, 2021
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="Card-description">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           The 2020 election saw more than $1 billion in “dark money” spending at the federal level, a massive sum driven by an explosion of secret donations boosting Democrats.
          </p>
         </div>
         <a href="https://www.opensecrets.org/news/2021/03/one-billion-dark-money-2020-electioncycle/">
          <div class="Card-cta Button Button--teal">
           Read More
          </div>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="BlogPromo l-padding u-mt3 u-mb3">
    <div class="l-wrap">
     <div class="BlogPromo-wrapper">
      <svg aria-hidden="true" class="BlogPromo-icon" enable-background="new 0 0 48.318 43.055" focusable="false" height="43.055px" id="Layer_1" preserveaspectratio="xMidYMid meet" role="img" viewbox="0 0 48.318 43.055" width="48.318px" x="0px" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" y="0px">

   <div class="Main-wrap l-padding u-mt4">
    <div class="l-wrap">
     <div class="l-grid-3 js-equalHeights u-clearfix u-mb3">
      <div class="l-col">
       <div class="PromoCard">
        <div class="PromoCard-image bg-navy">
         <img alt="Dataset 800" src="https://cdn1.opensecrets.org/rails-assets/production/assets/stock-photos/dataset-800-3fa358bd873431ddacb7dfe7fe91ed751c6e8554f1032b1e96d4505298721b2d.png"/>
        </div>
        <div class="PromoCard-wrap">
         <div class="PromoCard-content">
          <h2 class="PromoCard-title f-strata-title f-uppercase">

    <div class="l-wrap">
     <!-- News Promos -->
     <div class="u-center u-mt4 u-mb4">
      <p class="f-strata-title f-uppercase u-mb2">
       Inform, Empower &amp; Advocate
      </p>
      <p class="f-strata-subtitle u-mb2">
       OpenSecrets is the nation's top resource for clear and unbiased information.
      </p>
     </div>
     <div class="NewsPromo u-mb4">
      <div class="NewsPromo-wrap">
       <p class="NewsPromo-source">
        <a class="NewsPromo-source-link" href="#">
         Ruth Marcus, columnist, The Washington Post
        </a>
        <!--span class="NewsPromo-meta">, June 23, 2016</span-->
       </p>
       <p class="NewsPromo-quote">
        The Center for Responsive Politics has made itself into an essential Washington — actually, make that an essential national — institution. Now more than ever, with the proliferation of super PACs and 501(c)(4) groups pouring huge sums into campaigns, it's critical to have a reliable and handy source of information on money and politics. Opensecrets.org is the go-to site for this data — trustworthy, accessible and well-presented.
       </p>
       <!--ul class="NewsPromo-actions">
      <li class="NewsPromo-actions-item"><a href="#" class="NewsPromo-actions-link">View original article<span aria-hidden="true">&nbsp;›</span></a></li>

    </ul-->
      </div>

}

  100% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

  position: relative;
  margin: auto;
}

     <div class="StayConnected-secondary">
      <ul class="StayConnected-social">
       <li class="StayConnected-social-item">
        <a class="StayConnected-social-link LinkIcon" href="https://twitter.com/opensecretsdc">
         <span class="LinkIcon-icon c-red">
          <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" height="17" preserveaspectratio="xMidYMid meet" role="img" viewbox="0 0 182 148" width="21" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <path d="M181.9 17.6c-5.1 7.5-11.3 13.9-18.6 19.2.1 1.1.1 2.8.1 5 0 10-1.5 20-4.4 30-3 10-7.4 19.6-13.3 28.8s-13 17.3-21.2 24.2-18.2 12.6-29.8 16.9C83 146 70.5 148.1 57.3 148c-20.8-.1-39.9-5.7-57.3-16.8 2.7.3 5.7.4 9 .4 17.3 0 32.8-5.3 46.4-16-8.1-.1-15.4-2.6-21.8-7.4-6.4-4.8-10.8-10.9-13.2-18.5 2.6.4 4.9.6 7 .6 3.3 0 6.6-.4 9.8-1.3-8.6-1.8-15.7-6.1-21.4-13-5.7-6.9-8.5-14.8-8.5-23.7V52c5.2 3 10.8 4.5 16.9 4.7-5.1-3.4-9.1-7.9-12.1-13.3S7.6 32.1 7.7 25.7c0-6.8 1.7-13.1 5-18.9 9.4 11.5 20.7 20.7 34 27.6s27.6 10.7 42.9 11.5c-.5-2.9-.7-5.7-.7-8.5 0-10.3 3.6-19.1 10.9-26.4s16-10.9 26.3-11c10.8 0 20 3.9 27.4 11.8 8.4-1.7 16.3-4.7 23.7-9.1-3 8.9-8.5 15.7-16.5 20.6 7.1-.8 14.3-2.7 21.4-5.8l-.2.1z">
           </path>
          </svg>

         <span class="LinkIcon-text">
          Follow us on Twitter
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="StayConnected-social-item">
        <a class="StayConnected-social-link LinkIcon" href="https://facebook.com/opensecrets">
         <span class="LinkIcon-icon c-red">
          <svg aria-hidden="true" focusable="false" height="25" preserveaspectratio="xMidYMid meet" role="img" viewbox="0 0 27 52" width="13" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
           <path d="M27 .4v8.3h-4.9c-1.8 0-3 .4-3.6 1.1s-.9 1.9-.9 3.4V19h9.2l-1.2 9.3h-7.9V52H8V28.3H0V19h8v-6.8c0-3.9 1.1-6.9 3.3-9s5-3.2 8.6-3.2c3 0 5.4.1 7.1.4z">
           </path>
          </svg>
         </span>
         <span class="LinkIcon-text">
          Follow us on Facebook
         </span>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
